mapper.select: SELECT * FROM hook_info WHERE app_id = #{appId} ORDER BY package_name ASC, version ASC
SELECT * FROM hook_info WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM hook_info WHERE id = #{id} AND app_id = #{appId} LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM hook_info WHERE app_id = #{appId} AND package_name = #{packageName} AND enabled = 1 AND (version = #{version} OR version = '*') ORDER BY CASE WHEN version = #{version} THEN 0 WHEN version = '*' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hook_info ( app_id, package_name, version, enabled, data, dex_data, zip_data, zip_version, require_card_verification, created_by, updated_by, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{appId}, #{packageName}, #{version}, #{enabled}, #{data}, #{dexData}, #{zipData}, #{zipVersion}, #{requireCardVerification}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE hook_info SET package_name = #{packageName}, version = #{version}, enabled = #{enabled}, data = #{data}, dex_data = #{dexData}, zip_data = #{zipData}, zip_version = #{zipVersion}, require_card_verification = #{requireCardVerification}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND app_id = #{appId}
UPDATE hook_info SET enabled = #{enabled}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND app_id = #{appId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM hook_info WHERE id = #{id} AND app_id = #{appId}
